Html:
Hi,

Was wondering if anyone could clarify this for me... Been walking through this tutorial and I don't understand the difference between the Browse and Details methods. I know one takes a string and the other an int as arguments but in the tutorial, we go to /Store/Details/5 for the Details and for the Browse method, /Store/Browse?Genre=Disco

Anyone know the difference and why we can't go to /Store/Browse/Disco instead of passing it as a querystring parameter.

Cheers
